availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Nichols (Northfield, Washington County, Vermont, physician and politician)

body.p: Northfield, Washington County, Vermont, physician and politician. Vermont native. Son of James Nichols and Annie Aiken Dole Nichols. Married Ellen Maria Nichols c.1852. Attended Newbury Seminary in Newbury, Vermont between 1842 and 1849. Student in Woodstock, Windsor County, Vermont in 1850. Graduated from Vermont Medical College in Woodstock, Vermont in 1851. Druggist in Northfield, Washington County, Vermont in 1860. Employed Hannah Cannon in Windsor County in 1860. Served in Thirteenth Regiment, Vermont Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as surgeon from October 7, 1862 to July 21, 1863. Secretary of State of Vermont from 1865 to 1884.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Vermont, Windsor County, Woodstock, p. 104. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Vermont, Washington County, Northfield, p. 889. Find A Grave, "George Henry Nichols (April 17, 1827-April 28, 1907)," Memorial #9495316, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94945316 (accessed May 14, 2019). Theodore S. Peck, _Revised Roster of Vermont Volunteers and Lists of Vermonter who Served in the Army and Navy of the United States during the War of Rebellion, 1861-1866 (Montpelier, Vermont: Press of the Watchman Publishing co., 1892), 478, 482 (accessed via HaitiTrust). William Arba Ellis ed., _Norwich University, 1819-1911: Her History, Her Graduates, Her Honor Roll, vol. 3 (Montpelier, VT: The Capital City Press, 1911), 58-60. KYR-0001-009-0055.
